actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to clarify that the Administrator of the Small Business Administration is authorized to make economic injury disaster loans in response to disasters caused by drought.
short_title: Small Business Administration Drought Assistance Act

summary.text: Small Business Administration Drought Assistance Act - Amends the Small Business Act to specify that the Administrator of the Small Business Administration may make economic injury disaster loans in response to drought disasters.

titles.title: Small Business Administration Drought Assistance Act
To amend the Small Business Act to clarify that the Administrator of the Small Business Administration is authorized to make economic injury disaster loans in response to disasters caused by drought.
